<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This is for updating the default value for the 'discover' field on discovery_schedule and discovery_status tables</description>
        <name>Update default discover value</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var tables = ['discovery_schedule', 'discovery_status'];
tables.forEach(function (table) {
  updateDefaultDiscoverValue(table);
});

function updateDefaultDiscoverValue(table) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', table);
	gr.addQuery('element', 'discover');
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query();

	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('default_value', 'javascript:new DiscoverChoiceList().getDefaultValue(\'' + table + '\');');
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
